title: MY PING IS UNSTABLE
body: i had like 1 months with this problem my normal ping is 70 butt now is from 100-400 it get up to 313 then goes down to 109 then goes up again and like that any idea of what it is??

replies.body:
Unstable latency (ping) can be caused by a number of issues. The most common are local configurations that conflict with League or issues along your route to the server. The guide that *Rineyy* linked is my recommended first step in tracking down the cause and solving this for good. 

If you still see issues after taking the steps in that guide, please let me know.
Welp, at least your ping isn't over 10000 like mine :(
